gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 124, Heat 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Heat, 124-116, in Miami. Coby White led Chicago with 26 points, 11 assists, and seven rebounds as Ayo Dosunmu (season-high 24 points, eight rebounds, five assists) and Nikola Vucevic (24 points, 12 rebounds, seven assists) combined for 48 points. Jaime Jacquez Jr. led Miami with 22 points, four rebounds, and four assists as Jimmy Butler added 20 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists. The Bulls snap a two game skid and improve to 10-16 on the year as the Heat move to 14-11.
